articles.author: Will Richards
articles.title: Violinist wows 'America's Got Talent' with cover of System Of A Down's 'Chop Suey' - NME
articles.description: A violinist on America's Got Talent received a standing ovation after a stunning performance of System Of A Down's 'Chop Suey'.
articles.content:
A violinist on America’s Got Talent received a standing ovation after a stunning performance of System Of A Down‘s ‘Chop Suey’.
Phillip Bowen, a contestant on the 18th season of the long-running TV … [+1327 chars]
